Equipment Actions.Action 1: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 6 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Nothic makes 2 Claw attacks
Other Actions.Action 2: Rotting Gaze, The Nothic targets a creature who makes a Constitution saving throw, taking an Average 10 Necrotic damage on a failure
Other Actions.Action 3: Weird Insight, The Nothic targets a creature and begins a mental contest with them.  The Nothic makes a Wisdom (Insight) check against the target's Charisma (Deception) check.  If the NOthic wins, it magically learns one fact or secret about the target

Abilities.Ability 1: Keen Sight, The Nothic has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight
